question: According to "Casting Hybrid Digital-Analog Training into Hierarchical Energy-Based Learning", how can the delta of energy function be used in the EP gradient of EBM and BP gradient of FF module?
answer_format: Your answer should be in fluential English.

scoring_points: The EP gradient uses the difference of the second-order gradient of energy function.
The BP gradient uses the difference of the fourth-order gradient of energy function.
